Azure Maps Creator now available in preview
As enterprises continue to evolve in their digital transformation journey, there is a need for augmenting Azure Maps content with project-specific and private business knowledge of places. Today we're launching Azure Maps Creator in preview to extend location intelligence to indoor spaces. Enterprises

Updates to Azure Maps Web SDK includes powerful new features
Today, we are announcing updates to the Azure Maps Web SDK, which adds support for common spatial file formats, introduces a new data driven template framework for popups, includes several OGC services, and much more. Spatial IO module   With as little as three lines of code this module makes

Microsoft Connected Vehicle Platform: trends and investment areas
This post was co-authored by the extended Azure Mobility Team. The past year has been eventful for a lot of reasons.
